attributes.action: Ensure DNA & other material for every convicted felon, suspect & volenteer kept in perptuity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recruitment of 'bogus' muslims within Kirkham & other prisons extends back to at least 1995. Those with a history of violence & a chip on their shoulder present a serious terrorist threat. Extortion by al Qaeda operatives within the UK dates back to at least 2003. Those suspected of criminal activity & associates of felons too require tracking [e.g., Ian Brady had access to numerous vehicles before his conviction]. Volunteers keen to register to expedite entry to USA both for vacation & work.
